name: HeadShot (Edevjogos)
description:
Headshot is a cartoon-style shooting game. Your only goal is to shoot the characters that run through the screen.

This project started as a intern joke among the T-bone team (Group that i'm part of as developer) and co-workers, but eventually we found a potential to develop it as a full game.
The game is made of funny simulated cardboard 2D graphics, with a puppet theater theme that turns the game smooth and relaxing.
During the game you'll find some power-ups that help you get more points in less time or slow down the characters.
And do not forget to reload your ammo! Otherwise you'll let some character escape costing you your precious lives.
